title: Ride 70+ Bike Parks for $225 w/ Loam Pass Pre-Season Sale
content:
Loam Pass debuted just a couple years ago and already has more than 70 bike parks, shuttle services, and guides on their program, and you can access them all for just $299 per year. Or, hustle and you can get the annual pass for $225 before March 1, 2026. Kid’s passes (ages 6-11) are just $200.

The pass works just like a multi-park ski pass. Buy it once and you get a full season of riding with TWO free day passes at all bike parks, plus 50% off a third day at most of them. Favorites like Kingdom Trails (VT), Angel Fire (NM), Windrock (TN), Ride Kanuga (NC), Jackson Hole (WY), Vailocity (CO), and lots more are included. Here’s a map:

All regions are included, giving you more than 136 days of riding. Loam Pass passes are digital, saved on your phone, but you can add $20 for a physical pass add-on that comes with stickers and other treats…and is a nice back up in case there’s no cell service on the mountain (common) or your battery’s dead.
